javadoc: Adapter to access the default settings and instance settings database tables.

methods.name: createSettingsRecord

params.name: dataTypeID
params.comment: data type ID associated with the setting

params.name: strValue
params.comment: string value; null if setting is not String

params.name: longValue
params.comment: long value; -1 if setting is not a long

params.name: byteValue
params.comment: byte array value; null if setting is not a byte array

throws.comment: if there was a problem accessing the database
